llm_enhanced_instruction: Now that you’re on Notion, click the “+ New page” button in the left sidebar to create a new page where your database will live, so you can choose a database layout next.
llm_context: A blank page opens with a title field at the top and a setup panel showing a Databases section with options like “Table – Full page” and “Board – Full page,” indicating you’re one step closer to creating your database.
